definition: the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: W2: The most important people in my country are definitely professional athletes.
sentences.chinese: 我們國家的風雲人物當然是職業運動員了。

sentences.english: Thailand businessman Shi Li Hua , is the celebrity owning hundreds of millions assets on commercial circles.
sentences.chinese: 泰國商人施利華，是商界上擁有億萬資產的風雲人物。

sentences.english: The following is a list of 5 Internet figures in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 下面讓我們回顧一下本年度網絡風雲人物前五名。

sentences.english: Damn Homie, in highschool you was tha man, homie.
sentences.chinese: 喲，哥們，高中的時候你也算個風雲人物呀。

sentences.english: I just… Wanted it to be a surprise.
sentences.chinese: 不就是一年前，這位風雲人物。

sentences.english: He is the man of day.
Thai merchant Shi Lihua, is in the business circle has trillion property men of the hour.
sentences.chinese: 泰國商人施利華，是商界上擁有億萬資產的風雲人物。

sentences.english: Over the course of the school year, Rose became a campus icon and easily made friends wherever she went.
sentences.chinese: 在這一學年中，柔絲成爲了學校的風雲人物。

sentences.english: C: Who is the most important person in your country now?
sentences.chinese: 目前誰是你們國家的風雲人物？

definition: to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
Four Asian Tigers/East Asian Tigers/Four Little Dragons (East Asian economic powers: Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore and Hong Kong)
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
